gurmukhi: irpxI Awid aucwr kY irp iKp AMq bKwn ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cqur ic`q pihcwn ]425]
transliteration: Ripani Aadh Ouchaar Kai Rip Khip An Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Chatur Chitt Pahchaan||425||
translation: Keeping the word “Ripuni” in the beginning and saying “Ripukshai” at the end, O wise men ! the names of Paash to be recognized in the mind are fromed.425.

gurmukhi: AirxI Awid aucwir kY irp Air bhur bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn lyhu mqvwn ]426]
transliteration: Ariniaadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Bahur Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Lehu Matvaan||426||
translation: Saying the word “Arini” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of “Tupak” (Pash) are formed.426.

gurmukhi: rwjin Awid aucwir kY irp Air AMq bKwn ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cIn lyhu buDvwn ]427]
transliteration: Raajan(i) Aadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheen Lehoo Budhvaan||427||
translation: Saying “Raajni” in the beginning and adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, O wise men ! the names of Paash are formed.427.

gurmukhi: Awid eISrxI Sbd kih irp Air bhur bKwn ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInR lyhu mqvwn ]428]
transliteration: Aadh Dsharanishabad Kah(i) Ripar(i) Bahur Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheen Lehu Matvaan||428||
translation: Saying the word “Isharni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Paash are formed.428.

gurmukhi: BUpix Awid bKwn kY irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur Apwr ]429]
transliteration: Bhoopan(i) Aadh Bakhaan Kai Tip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Chatur Apaar||429||
translation: Saying the word “Bhoopani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Paash are formed.429.

gurmukhi: niRpjn eysRx Awid khu irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]430]
transliteration: Nripjan Esran Aadh Kaho Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Kehot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||430||
translation: Sayihng “Nrapjan Aishvaryani” in the beginning and uttrering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Paash are formed, which O poets ! You may know correctly.430.

gurmukhi: rwjin Awid bKwn kY irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur Apwr ]431]
transliteration: Raajan(i) Ad(i) Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Chatur Apaar||431||
translation: Saying the word “Rajni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of Paash are formed.431.

gurmukhi: eysin Awid bKwn kY AMqk bhur aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]432]
transliteration: Esan(i) Aadh Bakhaan Kai Antak Bahur Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||432
translation: Saying “Ishni” in the beginning and then uttering the word “Antak”, the names of Paash are fromed, which O poets, you may improve.432.

gurmukhi: piRQm nrySRx Sbd kih irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]433]
transliteration: Pritham Dareshran Shabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||433||
translation: Saying the word “Nareshni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Paash are formed correctly.433.

gurmukhi: Awid rwvnI Sbd kih irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]434]
transliteration: Ad(i) Raavanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||434||
translation: Saying the word “Ravani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Paash are formed.434.

gurmukhi: rwien Awid aucwir kY irp Air bhur bKwn ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN smJhu suGr sujwn ]435]
transliteration: Raain Aadh Ouchar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Bahur Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Samjhoh Soughar Sujaan||435||
translation: Saying “Raayan” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Paash are formed.435.

gurmukhi: eIsRix Awid bKwn kY irp Air aucrhu AMq ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur AnMq ]436]
transliteration: Eesran(i) Aadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Ouchroh Ant|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Chatur Anant||436||
translation: Saying “Ishrni” primarily, add “ripu Ari” at the end and recognize innumerable names of Paash.436.

gurmukhi: DujnI Awid bKwn kY irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur Apwr ]437]
transliteration: Dhujniaadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Chinoh Chatur Apaar||437||
translation: Sayng the word "Dhujni" in the beginning and then adding "Ripu Ari" at the end, the names of Paash are formed.437.

gurmukhi: dYqin Awid bKwn kY irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInhu su kib suDwr ]438]
transliteration: Daitan Aadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Chatur Apaar||438||
translation: Saying the word “Dhujni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Paash are recognized correctly.438.
